'''Wiseman Gamwich''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Wiseman was the son of [[Hamfast of Gamwich]]. He moved to [[Tighfield]], where his descendants became the [[Gamgee Family|Gamgees]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>
